note.p: Career: Banker, Temple Bar, partner in the London Bank of Child and Company, (1793); MP for Lancaster (1790-1812); MP for Poole (1818-1826)
Freemason, initiated 1788, Lodge of Friendship No 3, subsequently No 6.
References: The Library and Museum of Freemasonry 'Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' 2010, page 26
